switch.name: fcs/wing-sweep-dmd-flap-limit
switch.test: fcs/aux-flap-pos-deg ne 0 fcs/wing-sweep-dmd ge 0.308824 fcs/wing-sweep-dmd lt 0.323529
fcs/aux-flap-pos-deg ne 0 fcs/wing-sweep-dmd ge 0.323529 fcs/wing-sweep-dmd lt 0.338235

fcs_function.name: fcs/its-pitch-slats-norm
fcs_function.description: F-14-AAP-1 Figure 2-56 Integrated Trim Schedules - MANEUVER FLAPS - TEU

fcs_function.name: fcs/its-pitch-flaps-norm
fcs_function.description: F-14-AAP-1 Figure 2-56 Integrated Trim Schedules - LANDING FLAPS - TEU

fcs_function.name: fcs/pitch-1-dlc-tw-norm-v1
fcs_function.description: NASA TM-81833; Figure 5 - Increment horizontal stabilizer command as function of DLC thumbwheel position (Normalized based on )

fcs_function.name: fcs/spoiler-differential-stick-cmd
fcs_function.description: Differential spoiler due to stick deflection

switch.name: fcs/spoiler-ground-brake-deployed
switch.test: systems/hydraulics/combined-system-pressure ne 0 fcs/wing-sweep-pos-deg lt 55.0 fcs/spoiler-ground-brake-armed ne 0.0 fcs/throttle-cmd-norm[0] le 0.15 fcs/throttle-cmd-norm[1] le 0.15 position/aircraft-on-ground ne 0

aerosurface_scale.name: fcs/dlc-thumbwheel-pos-deg
aerosurface_scale.description: DLC thumbwheel deflection, positive for aft deflection, aft deflection = retract spoilers deg +/- 50

ifthen.and:
fcs/stick-dlc-mf-switch-lv fcs/stick-dlc-mf-switch
fcs/flap-pos-deg 25
fcs/throttle-pos-norm[0] 0.91
fcs/throttle-pos-norm[1] 0.91
systems/hydraulics/combined-system-psi 2100 >

switch.name: fcs/spoiler-left-dmd
switch.description: Left wing spoiler deflection demanded value based on stick position taking into account ground spoilers and missing wings

fcs_function.name: fcs/spoiler-left-outer-cmd
fcs_function.description: Left spoiler commanded deflection - adjusted to negative deflection (when flaps deployed) and scaled to be -4 to 55 degrees based on demand with additional DLC demanded deflection

fcs_function.name: fcs/spoiler-left-inner-cmd
fcs_function.description: Left spoiler commanded deflection - adjusted to negative deflection (when flaps deployed) and scaled to be -4 to 55 degrees based on demand with additional DLC demanded deflection

aerosurface_scale.name: fcs/spoiler-left-inner-pos-deg
aerosurface_scale.description: Left inner spoiler actuator position in degrees

aerosurface_scale.name: fcs/spoiler-left-outer-pos-deg
aerosurface_scale.description: Left outer spoiler actuator position in degrees

switch.name: fcs/spoiler-right-dmd
switch.description: Right wing spoiler deflection demanded value based on stick position taking into account ground spoilers and missing wings

fcs_function.name: fcs/spoiler-right-outer-cmd
fcs_function.description: Right spoiler commanded deflection - adjusted to negative deflection (when flaps deployed) and scaled to be -4 to 55 degrees based on demand with additional DLC demanded deflection

fcs_function.name: fcs/spoiler-right-inner-cmd
fcs_function.description: Right spoiler commanded deflection - adjusted to negative deflection (when flaps deployed) and scaled to be -4 to 55 degrees based on demand with additional DLC demanded deflection

aerosurface_scale.name: fcs/spoiler-right-outer-pos-deg
aerosurface_scale.description: Right outer spoiler actuator position in degrees

aerosurface_scale.name: fcs/spoiler-right-inner-pos-deg
aerosurface_scale.description: Right inner spoiler actuator position in degrees

switch.name: systems/NWS/engaged
switch.test: gear/unit[0]/wheel-speed-fps le 135 systems/hydraulics/combined-system-pressure ne 0 position/aircraft-on-ground ne 0 systems/holdback/launchbar-engaged eq 0

switch.name: fcs/yaw-damper-active
switch.test: fcs/yaw-damper-enable ne 0.0 simulation/sim-time-sec gt 2.0 gear/wow eq 0 aero/alpha-deg gt -10 aero/alpha-deg lt 25

fcs_function.name: sas/roll-sas-1-input-0
fcs_function.description: Sum of all stick inputs (stick, trim)

fcs_function.name: sas/roll-sas-1-input
fcs_function.description: Stick position force simulation - ref: NAVAIR 01-F14AAP-1, 2.22.3.1 Lateral Feel. An artificial feel system provides the pilot with force cues and feedback. The lateral feel mechanism is a spring roller cam assembly with a neutral stick position detent and a constant stick deflection force gradient.

fcs_function.name: aero/alpha-indicated-deg
fcs_function.description: NASA TM-81833, page 56, Figure 17; converted to linear function, tuned based on flight tests

function.description: Centre of pressure due to mach and wingsweep angle
High speeds CADC control effectivity limitation of rudder and stabilator

pure_gain.name: cg-x-chord-percent
pure_gain.description: Percent offset of the CoP from the CG

switch.name: position/aircraft-on-ground
switch.test: gear/unit[0]/WOW ne 0 gear/unit[1]/WOW ne 0 gear/unit[2]/WOW ne 0
